paper_abstract: In [11,13] we showed how to combine propositional BDI logics using Gabbay's fibring methodology. In this paper we extend the above mentioned works by providing a tableau-based decision procedure for the combined/fibred logics. We show how to uniformly construct a tableau calculus for the combined logic using Governatori's labelled tableau system KEM.
paper_title: On constructing fibred tableaux for BDI logics
